A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Went in hoping it would be good\, turned out to be the worst Star Wars film I've ever seen. This mess made the prequels look amazing. The plot seemed to go nowhere for 2 hours\, the ending completely disinterested me from the franchise as a whole. Absolutely dissapointed and won't be watching future Star Wars films made by Disney. Props to Rian Johnson for ruining the very idea of Star Wars in every way possible.
